attributes.review: This app is very laggy and doesn’t even function correctly. I don’t know what they mean by “Make America Great again” but that is very disappointing. American was never great, it only benefited white people. #smd #notcool
attributes.title: NOT WORTH IT!

attributes.title: Worst you could think of

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to read the news but all I got was harassment to people on the left and racism. I cannot handle the fact that our president thinks bullying is okay. These are bullies. These are high school f*cking BULLIES.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: So when you first download the app there’s this weird alien looking creature that pops up and has a strong resemblance to Chester the cheetah. I of course jumped out of fright and fell off my bed only to hit my head on the dresser. I then proceeded to bleed out of my head and had to go to the hospital, I am now getting legal action for this situation. And whoever this weird corn for hair person is pretending to be “a good president” but is really a mindless orange noodle should get their rights revoked. If a cheeto puff can run this country why can’t I??? I will be submitting this as my official presidential campaign speech. Also i’ve added as much merchandise as possible to my cart and it’s all so ugly🤩 you misogynistic whore✨✨. Anyways I hope everyone who isn’t racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, or a rapist, has an excellent rest of the day. everyone else can go rot in the fiery pits of hell like you deserve🥰 Oh also this imposter reminds me of the talking orange, a profound and sophisticated show that deserves no such resemblance to this tiny penis man.
attributes.title: He’s an imposter

attributes.review: this app treated me like i was a piece of DELICIOUS cake and it said the meanest things about feet, like luv what u for against feet with 8 toes? worst of all when i downloaded the app, a CHEETO popped up... like sis -🙈anyways i was minding my own business looking all fine and shi and feeling immaculate, when i got an EMAIL from the app saying to go to shreks village... let’s say i kindly passed on the opportunity because fiona would be mad luv and i would lit rally not like that luv💋 anyways i’m rating this app a 1 star because it’s a terrible app, i’d rather download WISHBONE than this app (no hate to wishbone) .. anyways my husband ross lynch said that it was not a good app either, the rat between my walls and the roaches in my rooster said it wasn’t good either.
attributes.title: most UGLIEST app in my whole scrumptydumptious life EVER.

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to show love and support my president and ever since I downloaded it my phone glitches all the time!! 😡 I don’t know what’s wrong. At first everything went well but when I put my phone number to create an account, my phone started doing random things like calling people without me touching it, playing music on Spotify, writing messages to my friends and family etc....
I’m writing a review to help others, so 

⚠️IF YOU WANT TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP, DONT  DO IT !! ⚠️

 it’s really bad and should be banned !!

But anyways #TRUMP2020🇺🇸
Thank you for your time 💕🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: 🚨WORST APP EVER⚠️

attributes.review: I completely hate this app it asked for my zip code.and I really don’t want ANY oranges at my door looking for me for tricking him into thinking he would have people at his rally tehehe. And I saw an add for it that said that willy wonka of TikTok would show up at my house shirtless😻 but I still don't see him heart ❤been😌broke💔so🗒many🍧times⌚I😞don't⚡️know👅what🤪to👉believe🟨
attributes.title: Orange  man🧡😻

attributes.review: I downloaded this app after receiving a message from the Cheeto mafia. No it was willing, they told me they knew where I lived and knew what my pet chea-pet looks like ;-; I was so scared for my grass pet that I quickly downloaded the app. It couldn’t hurt right? It took 4 YEARS TO DOWNLOAD! I’m already graduated from college at this point... when I opened the app all I saw was little Cheeto di*k, it caused me to go blind instantly. Dr.Willy Wonka said I’d never get my sight back. Now I’m blind and the last thing I can remember looking at is his soggy cheeto. I cry at night thinking about it, my chea pet keeps waking me up every night wiping my tears away with his little grass. 😢😢 it’s the only thing that gives me comfort anymore. VERY BAD APP!
attributes.title: ASSAULTED
